briefdescription.para: External definition for better garbage collection management, used in ProcessEvent.
Wraps accessing the "turn" custom properties of a room.
Gets the elapsed time in the current turn in seconds

detaileddescription.para: The elapsed time in the turn.

briefdescription.para: Gets the remaining seconds for the current turn.

detaileddescription.para: The remaining seconds fo the current turn

briefdescription.para: Gets a value indicating whether the turn is completed by all.

detaileddescription.para: true if this turn is completed by all; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Gets a value indicating whether the current turn is finished by me.

detaileddescription.para: true if the current turn is finished by me; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Gets a value indicating whether the current turn is over.

detaileddescription.para: That is the ElapsedTimeinTurn is greater or equal to the TurnDuration
true if the current turn is over; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: The duration of the turn in seconds.

detaileddescription.para: Set this to your own script instance to catch Callbacks

briefdescription.para: The turn manager event offset event message byte.

detaileddescription.para: Used internaly for defining data in Room Custom Properties
Used internaly for saving data in Room Custom Properties

briefdescription.para: The Final Move event message byte.

detaileddescription.para: Used internaly for saving data in Room Custom Properties

briefdescription.para: Tells the TurnManager to begins a new turn.

detaileddescription.para: Optionally finish the turn, too. The move object can be anything. Try to optimize though and only send the strict minimum set of information to define the turn move.

briefdescription.para: Gets if the player finished the current turn.

simplesect.para: true, if player finished the current turn, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Provides an Interface (IPunTurnManagerCallbacks) for the typical turn flow and logic, between players Provides Extensions for Player, Room and RoomInfo to feature dedicated api for TurnBased Needs
